review: I have never met a such a humble doctor as he listened to our problem thoroughly. I surely recommend this doctor for patients suffering from heart problems. I am now back to my normal activities and i am able to concentrate more on my work. My hats off to his dedication and service to mankind. Long live this doctor so that many suffering patients can be cured.
He is very excellent and service dedicated Doctor. He explained the patient condition time to time and treated my mother aged 80 years with serious condition to normal. GREAT

A nice human being and an excellent doctor with a magic hand blessed by the god to treat his patients. We were fortunate to get him as our consultant for heart angioplasty of my mother. Timely treatment and friendliness behaviour made us feel in secure hands.
